item.title: How to permanently exclude localhost from HSTS list in Google Chrome
item.description: Stackoverflow give several ways to resolve localhost HSTS issue (redirect from http to https). My laptop is managed by my employer and registry canâ€™t be edited. "How can I see which sites have set the HSTS flag in my edge browser?" in chatgpt give me an answers. One step of the answer get my attention. I can change HSTS in my application for development environment. It is too late now.
